title: BRIEF-Trichome Financial To Begin Trading On TSX Venture Exchange Under Ticker "TFC"
text:
BRIEF-Trichome Financial To Begin Trading On TSX Venture Exchange Under Ticker "TFC"

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 17:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Trichome Financial To Begin Trading On TSX Venture Exchange Under Ticker "TFC" Oct 9 (Reuters) - Trichome Financial Corp: * TRICHOME FINANCIAL TO BEGIN TRADING ON TSX VENTURE EXCHANGE UNDER TICKER "TFC" * TRICHOME FINANCIAL CORP - CO'S COMMON SHARES WILL BEGIN TRADING ON TSX VENTURE EXCHANGE ON OCT 10, UNDER TRADING SYMBOL "TFC"

BRIEF-Trichome Financial To Begin Trading On TSX Venture Exchange Under Ticker "TFC"
